CustomField.description: Either the 25th of the month or every Friday. The CPL batch will run daily and if it is a Friday it will look for CPLs with a Friday print date to send to customers. On the 25th of the month, the batch will look for Print Dates of every 25th.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When should this be emailed to the recipient?
CustomField.label: Print Date
